title: Natural Language Command Processing in Supported Languages
description: Verify the system correctly processes natural language commands in English, Hindi, Gujarati, and Hinglish with intent recognition accuracy greater than 90%.

steps.description: Send a natural language task creation command via WhatsApp in English.
Verify intent and entities are correctly extracted with â‰¥90% accuracy and task is created.
Send similar commands in Hindi, Gujarati, and Hinglish sequentially.
Validate correct intent recognition and task creation in all languages.

title: Multiple Phone Number Extraction and User Selection
description: Confirm that when a contact with multiple phone numbers is shared, the system accurately extracts all numbers and prompts the user for selection without data loss.

steps.description: Send a WhatsApp contact card containing multiple phone numbers.
System detects all phone numbers and prompts user to select the correct number.
Choose one phone number when prompted.
Confirm the selected phone number is registered as contact and logged correctly.

title: Dual WhatsApp Notifications on Task Creation and Status Update
description: Ensure that task creation and status updates send notifications to both the task assignee and the task creator with confirmation of delivery.

steps.description: Create a new task assigning it to a user via WhatsApp.
Verify WhatsApp notifications are sent to both assignee and creator with delivery confirmation.
Update the task status via WhatsApp.
Confirm both parties receive status update notifications with delivery confirmation.

title: Phone Number Normalization Consistency Between Frontend and Backend
description: Validate that phone numbers are normalized consistently between frontend UI (with + prefix) and backend API (without +), ensuring data consistency.

steps.description: Enter a phone number in the frontend user interface including country code with + sign.
Verify frontend normalizes phone number with + prefix.
Submit the phone number to backend API.
Verify backend receives the phone number normalized without + prefix.
Retrieve the phone number from backend and display in UI.
Ensure frontend re-applies + prefix correctly without data corruption.

title: Authentication Workflow with WhatsApp Verification
description: Test the authentication system for login and verification via WhatsApp verification code, ensuring no errors in workflows.

steps.description: Attempt login by entering a valid phone number.
Verify WhatsApp verification code is sent to the phone number.
Enter the correct verification code received.
Confirm successful login and session is established.
Attempt login with incorrect verification code.
Verify login fails with appropriate error message and does not lock user out.

title: Admin Dashboard Real-Time AI Usage and Cost Management
description: Validate that the admin dashboard displays real-time AI usage metrics, system health, and cost management controls with live updates.

steps.description: Log in as an admin and navigate to the AI Admin Dashboard.
Check for real-time AI usage statistics and cost tracking visualizations.
Trigger AI usage by sending natural language commands.
Verify usage metrics update live on the dashboard.
Use budget control features such as emergency stop.
Confirm budget controls are applied immediately and reflected in system status.

title: AI Adaptive Learning and Pattern Management
description: Test that the AI learning system tracks unknown user inputs, learns patterns correctly, and supports admin manual override and pattern management.

steps.description: Send unrecognized natural language inputs via WhatsApp.
Confirm inputs are logged as unknown and clarifications are requested.
Use the admin dashboard to review and create new AI patterns manually.
Verify the newly created patterns correctly resolve similar inputs.
Send previously unknown inputs again.
Ensure AI responds accurately based on learned patterns.

title: Frontend UI Navigation and SPA Routing Stability
description: Verify all frontend UI navigations directly via URLs route correctly with SPA routing, and no 404 errors occur on page refresh or direct access.

steps.description: Directly access various app URLs for pages such as tasks, projects, team management, dashboard, and templates.
Confirm that pages render correctly without 404 errors.
Refresh pages at those same URLs.
Verify pages reload successfully with route intact and no errors.
Navigate within the frontend SPA using UI elements and browser back/forward controls.
Ensure all navigations work seamlessly without broken links or errors.

title: Backend API Endpoint Response and Error Handling
description: Validate all backend API endpoints return expected responses for valid requests and handle invalid requests gracefully while maintaining data consistency.

steps.description: Send valid API requests to task, project, team, and authentication endpoints.
Verify correct success responses with accurate data.
Send invalid or malformed API requests (e.g. missing parameters, unauthorized access).
Confirm error responses are descriptive and no data corruption occurs.
Concurrently update the same resource to test data consistency and race conditions.
Ensure final data state is consistent and no lost updates are observed.

title: Clarification Handling to Prevent Loops and Repeated Errors
description: Ensure the system provides meaningful clarification messages to users, prevents clarification loops, and offers helpful guidance for error correction.

steps.description: Send ambiguous or incomplete natural language inputs via WhatsApp.
Verify system requests clarifications in a clear way.
Respond with another ambiguous input.
Confirm system prevents endless loops by limiting clarifications and suggesting alternative help.
Provide correct input following guidance.
Verify system processes input successfully and exits clarification mode.

title: Comprehensive User Workflow Coverage with Pass Rate Verification
description: Automated and manual tests cover all critical user workflows achieving at least 80% pass rate before production deployment.

steps.description: Execute automated test suites covering task management, project management, team collaboration, WhatsApp interactions, AI learning, and admin dashboard.
Confirm all automated tests pass and code coverage is above threshold.
Conduct manual exploratory testing of key workflows especially natural language interaction and clarifications.
Ensure manual testing validates system stability and usability with at least 80% overall workflow pass rate.

title: Task and Project CRUD Operations via Frontend and WhatsApp
description: Verify that create, read, update, and delete operations for tasks and projects work seamlessly across the React frontend and WhatsApp interface with data consistency and role-based access control.

steps.description: Create a new task through WhatsApp natural language command and via React frontend.
Confirm tasks are created on both interfaces and data is synchronized.
Update task details and status via both interfaces.
Verify updates reflect correctly and notifications trigger as expected.
Delete a task via frontend and WhatsApp.
Ensure task deletion is consistent with backend data and UI shows updated task list.
Attempt unauthorized CRUD operation as non-admin or unauthorized role.
Confirm access is denied and appropriate error messages are returned.

title: Team and Role-Based Access Control Validation
description: Test team management features and enforce role-based access control for users on task and project operations.

steps.description: Create team members with different roles (admin, member, guest) via frontend.
Verify role assignments are saved and visible in Team management UI.
Attempt to perform privileged actions such as project creation and team editing with each role.
Confirm only authorized roles can perform restricted actions, others receive access denied messages.
Review detailed analytics and usage reports restricted to admins.
Validate that non-admin roles cannot access or see admin analytics.
